parameters.value: ={{ [{"parts":[{"text":"Analyze this business performance data and provide 3 actionable recommendations to increase revenue: Balance: ‚Ç¨" + $json.balance.current + ", 30-day revenue: ‚Ç¨" + $json.revenue.last30Days + ", Growth rate: " + $json.revenue.growthRate + "%, Conversion rate: " + $json.sales.conversionRate + "%.
